chunk:
Juice Beauty Daily Essentials Cleansing Milk

Brand: Juice Beauty

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: \"* = Certified organic ingredient = Plant derived Full Ingredients: vitis vinifera (organic white grape juice)*, aloe barbadensis (organic aloe juice)*, vegetable glycerin, cetearyl alcohol, caprylic/capric triglyceride, prunus amygdalus dulc

runus amygdalus dulcis (organic sweet almond oil)*, carthamus tinctorius (organic safflower seed oil)*, rubus idaeus (organic red raspberry juice)*, helianthus annuus (organic sunflower seed oil)*, sesamum indicum (organic sesame seed oil)*, vitis vinifera (organic grape seed oil), hydrolyzed linseed extract, cetearyl glucoside, gluconolactone, cal

gluconolactone, calcium gluconate, sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, potassium hydroxide, sodium citrate, citric acid, calendula officinalis (marigold flower extract), chamomilla recutita (chamomile extract), tilia cordata (linden flower extract), panthenol (Vitamin B5), ascorbic acid (Vitamin C), tocopherol (Vitamin E), allantoin, xanthan gum,

ntoin, xanthan gum, citrus sinensis (orange oil), boswellia carterii (frankincense oil)\"

Directions: Cleanse morning and evening by massaging into damp skin with a circular motion. Follow with Juice Beauty's Antioxidant Serum and Nutrient or Antioxidant Moisturizer.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Ca
estrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
